forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, this afternoon unfolds under a radiant sun, illuminating the iconic cityscape with a warm glow. The air feels pleasantly mild, as the temperature hovers near a comfortable 79 degrees, perfect for an outdoor stroll or a quiet moment in one of the many parks left sprawling across the city’s graceful hills. While the late afternoon draws nearer, you might notice a gentle descent in warmth, leading to a cozy evening that promises partially cloudy skies and a temperate low settling around 54 degrees. 

For the discerning passerby, layers may be the wisest choice; a light jacket will serve as a reliable companion against the subtle, refreshing breeze. As the day transitions into night, the softness of the clouds might inspire a leisurely dinner al fresco or perhaps a tranquil walk along the waterfront, where the calm waves playfully lap against the shore. The air, rich with possibility, invites you to pause and appreciate the simple joys that this vibrant city has to offer.
